Uses of Class
io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.Storage

  • Packages that use Storage 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.copycat.server
    Provides a standalone, feature-complete implementation of the Raft consensus algorithm.
    io.atomix.copycat.server.state
    Internal classes that manage RaftServer state.
    io.atomix.copycat.server.storage
    Provides a standalone segmented log for Copycat's Raft implementation.
    io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.compaction
    Classes and interfaces that support efficient Raft log compaction.
